name: Sanga
blurb: Sanga will revolutionize the way we all play 3D puzzle games. 1 Qoob, 2 Players, 3D puzzle, 4 You!

rewards.reward: *PATRONS* will definitely receive a hearty "thank-you" from me. You will also receive the free game for ... FREE! Anyone that pledges $1 or more will get their name in the Sanga Facebook page under credits. They will also be included in backer only updates.

*HISTORIANS* will receive all previous rewards + the PDF version of "Sanga: the Book!". (This will include the entire timeline of the game from inception to today. Every idea/thought I came up with while creating this game will be in the book. You will see the samples created by the overseas designer. You will also see all the "unique" art I personally designed, including the different logo designs I came up with. All art will include commentaries. This is an in-depth look at what went into the making of Sanga).

*V.I.P.s* will receive all previous rewards + a special Kickstarter edition of Sanga! This unique version of the app will contain a special Kickstarter title screen, and pieces. That's right, you will play with different pieces than the general public! All skins available during launch will be free for all backers at this level and above. (A skin is a downloadable item that will change the appearance of the Qoob). Lastly, you will have your name in the game credits.\r\nBEST VALUE!!!

*BELIEVERS* will receive all previous rewards + a custom made tablet sleeve with "Sanga" and the game board icon printed on it. The 9-3/4" x 8" size is just the right size for your first, second, third, or fourth generation iPad and other similar sized tablets. Helps protect your tablet when not playing Sanga.

*BENEFACTORS* will receive all previous rewards + a special "paper edition" of Sanga. This is the original 2D version I began and tested with. You will receive the game board + 27 game pieces, all laminated. You will be able to choose from any of the sets you see in "Sanga: the Book". A printed instruction manual will be included with the game. In addition, you will receive an invitation to the Launch Party (location TBD near L.A. You will be responsible for your own travels). Be there to chat with the dev team, and play with other Sanga enthusiasts. The party will host the first Sanga Challenge, which will include a competition, as well as a special puzzle I created for Sanga.

*PROMOTERS* will receive all previous rewards + your choice of THREE, that's right three, Sanga T-shirts with different game pieces printed on it. Now you don't have to worry about which shirt to wear. What you will have to worry about is ,with other color and shapes out there, can you wear the right one so you can form a Sanga with others? Quantities of each shirt will be limited, first backed, first serve! (Please add $20 for international shipping)

*CONSULTANTS* will receive all previous rewards + a 30 minute Q&A session via Skype with me and the head of the dev team. You will get to name one of the pieces in the game. Together we will design a special easter egg to be placed in the game as well! (No offensive, pornographic, racist content will be allowed. We reserve the right to make the final decision.) I will send you a hand written thank you note once the game is completed.

*LEGENDS* will receive all previous rewards. + you will be credited with "co-producer" in the game.\r\n\r\nWait, there's more! You and a guest will spend an evening with the creator (that's me, not THE creator). We will play games of Sanga using the "Take Out" model that you see in the video, after which I will present to you to have as your very own! You will receive a printed and bound version of "Sanga: the Book", signed by the team. All game pieces and game board will be signed by me. Then we shall have a nice dinner where I will show you how to solve a Rubiks Cube, I will perform a magic show for you, and a few other surprises! (Travel arrangements are not provided.)
